DOC.detailed_description: Patients breast cancer undergo adjuvant systemic chemotherapy base use anthracyclines screen start chemotherapy . Patients whose score brief fatigue inventory ( BFI ) increase receive first cycle chemotherapy consider manifested fatigue . The patient whose fatigue wo n't worse follow first cycle chemotherapy use control . We collect blood sample group 21 day start chemotherapy . We analyze follow biomarkers : IL2 , IL10 , TNF TGFB-1 measure amplification reaction ; FSH , LH , estradiol , DHEA , DHEAS cortisol hormone measure chemiluminescent enzyme immunometric assay
